scripts.test: npm run build-umd && npm run build-esm && tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && mocha --recursive
scripts.build-umd: gulp del-umd && tsc -p tsconfig.build.umd.json && gulp less-umd && gulp html-umd && gulp gitversionPackage && gulp addVersionNumber-umd
scripts.build-esm: gulp del-esm && tsc -p tsconfig.build.esm.json && gulp less-esm && gulp html-esm && gulp gitversionPackage && gulp addVersionNumber-esm
scripts.build: npm run build-umd && npm run build-esm
